original_text: It is like a grain of mustard seed, which, when sown on the ground, is the smallest of all the seeds on earth,
korean_text: 겨자씨 한 알과 같으니 땅에 심길 때에는 땅 위의 모든 씨보다 작은 것이로되

sentences.original_text: It is like a grain of mustard seed,
which is the smallest of all the seeds on earth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 땅에 있는 모든 씨 중에서 가장 작으니,
